## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G26440](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G26440)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PME12</u>
- **Gene Name:** pectin methylesterase 12
- **Description:**   Plant invertase/pectin methylesterase inhibitor superfamily;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
